title.value: Оценка лежкоспособности клубней сортов картофеля белорусской селекции
Estimation of storage properties of potato tubers of Belorussian breeding varieties

person.name: Fitsuro, D.D., National Academy of Sciences of Belarus, Minsk (Belarus). Scientific and Practical Center for Potato, Vegetable and Fruit Growing
Pishchenko, L.I., National Academy of Sciences of Belarus, Minsk (Belarus). Scientific and Practical Center for Potato, Vegetable and Fruit Growing

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were evaluated the storage properties of potato (Solanum tuberosum) varieties of different maturity groups from a nursery of ecological variety trials in comparison with the standard varieties. Varieties of potato with a long physiological dormant period were established: Delphin, Neptune, Talisman, Skarb, Kolorit, Zhuravinka, Zdabytak and others. It is necessary to remember that in spite of the ideal parameters of storage properties of any variety, during the basic period of storage of potato it is necessary to maintain the optimum temperature + 3-4 deg C and humidity of air of 85-95 %.
